document_data.name: ''Totem Dog Beer''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/Last Orders at the Yawning Portal|63}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Totem Dog Beer''''' was a type of magical alcohol available in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The [[enchanted]] [[beer]] was on the menu at the [[Yawning Portal]] tavern of Waterdeep, stashed away in [[Durnan]]'s cabinet. One serving of ''Totem Dog Beer'' was priced at ten [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
